stories.title: Profile Header Redesign
stories.description: Redesign the profile header to feature the user's profile picture, full name, and verification badge. Implement a modal-based image cropper for profile picture adjustments.
acceptance_criteria: Profile header displays profile picture, full name, and verification badge.
Profile picture is rounded with a max diameter of 120px.
Clicking the profile picture opens a modal-based image cropper.
Modal allows real-time image adjustments before saving.
Verification badge uses the platform's primary brand color.

stories.title: Verification Status Display
stories.description: Display a 'Verified User' label next to the user's name if verification is complete, or a 'Get Verified' call-to-action otherwise.
acceptance_criteria: 'Verified User' label is visible for verified users.
'Get Verified' call-to-action is visible for unverified users.
Verification status updates in real-time upon verification.

stories.title: Tabular Icon Layout for Metadata
stories.description: Introduce a tabular icon layout to display secondary metadata such as followers, location, occupation, and email address.
acceptance_criteria: Metadata section includes icons and counts for followers, location, occupation, and email.
Email address is partially masked for privacy.
Each field has an edit icon for quick access to edit modals.

stories.title: Expandable Bio Section
stories.description: Implement a dedicated bio section with expandable/collapsible long-form content, supporting dynamic theming and adaptive font sizing.
acceptance_criteria: Bio section supports expandable/collapsible functionality.
Bios exceeding 400 characters are truncated with a 'Show More' link.
Text areas adopt dynamic theming (light/dark mode).
Font sizing is adaptive for accessibility.

stories.title: Responsive Layout Implementation
stories.description: Build the user profile layout using a 12-column responsive grid to ensure compatibility across desktop, mobile, and tablet devices.
acceptance_criteria: Layout adapts to desktop (≥1024px), mobile (≤768px), and tablet (768px–1024px) screen sizes.
All components follow the company's Atomic Design system guidelines.
Layout is consistent with design references provided.

stories.title: UI Theming and Styling Enhancements
stories.description: Enhance UI theming and styling with ghost-style edit buttons, monospaced font for user handles, and tooltips for field descriptions.
acceptance_criteria: Edit buttons are styled as ghost buttons (bordered, no fill).
User handles use a monospaced font.
Tooltips are available on hover/tap for field descriptions.
